Name: LU 93 - Zoning, 27-24 College Point Boulevard Commercial Overlay, Queens (C 220185 ZMQ)
Title: Application number C 220185 ZMQ (27-24 College Point Boulevard Commercial Overlay) submitted by Bacele Realty Corp., pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 10a, by establishing within an existing R4 District a C2-3 District and establishing within an existing R5B District a C2-3 District, Borough of Queens, Community District 7, Council District 19.

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
